attributes.title: WORST APP IN THE APP STORE!!
attributes.review: When I opened this app both   my cat and dog began aggressively vomiting and ended up having heart attacks. My brother had to relapse to drugs to get the image of the scary pumpkin man on the front page out of his head. ANONYMOUS 2020!!

attributes.title: do not download
attributes.review: This took forever to download this is such a bad app i don’t not recommend to download this don’t waste ur time with this app it’s not worth it

attributes.title: THIS IS THE WORST APP🖕🏼
attributes.review: The app made my phone glitch and the app crashes almost every time you get on it don’t get the app it’s bad and will make your phone glitch

attributes.title: Do not download this app!!!!
attributes.review: As soon as I downloaded it my phone was traumatized it had installed 20 different viruses and glitching all over the place

attributes.title: WORST APP EVER
attributes.review: This app will never let you sleep!!!! It will text you every day and every hour of that day. It will constantly notify you of useless things.

attributes.title: Terrible🥰
attributes.review: I downloaded this app to show how much I love this racist orange but I realized that this rapist wasn’t worth my time to waste for this stupid president of yours🥰😍 now get this orange out the office please😘😘 thanks bye now😚

attributes.title: This app is horrible
attributes.review: I downloaded this app and it was glitching out and then I got a virus’s so I had to get a new phone 😒 uninstall this app and rate it one star it’s horrible

attributes.title: Actually terrible
attributes.review: This app STOLE my information and made my iPad glitch so much I had to buy a new one. DO NOT DOWNLOAD 😡😡😡. Also really bad formatting. If I could leave 0 stars I would.

attributes.title: Worst app
attributes.review: This was so long to download and I saw sexually activity on this app and someone tried to sell me drugs I cannot believe my eyes this is so weird do not get this app

attributes.title: Bad bad horrible ugly app
attributes.review: This app was horrible. Slow and buffering. Pointless. If i could rate 0 stars i would. TAKE IT DOWN. Im angry. BAD BAD HORRIBLE horrible news for me this morning I wanna puke is a good night for you.
